name: Itslearning mah dark
description:
Edit: I have graduated and my account is closed so I can no longer maintain this style. Use at your own risk, feel free to modify as needed.


A dark & debloater theme for it's learning for Malmo University.
additional_info:
This style isn't perfect. There are some pages with elements that I never navigate to so I didn't bother to fix them and some elements are difficult to style properly. If you ever take a look at the source for the platform you will notice it's really messy. I will update when I have time between exams ;). I have no idea if this works for other it's learning sites managed by other organizations. Please leave comments for if you have any suggestions or requests.

To style the iframes, (they are in the assignments page for example) you will have to add the following URLS that should have this style applied:

https://platform.itslearning.com
https://page.itslearning.com
https://applications.itslearning.com
